name: LM 1 - Research pick up
description: Odysseus picks up 2 researchers from Solaris hopefully before they are out of air
gm_notes: Possibility to send a message from Research station and then open text comms and later on voice comms to Odysseus

name: LM 2 - Velian pick up
character_ids: Xavier Blake, Alia Swanson, Zyra Lee, Malak Kovalenko, Roan Rowen, Tristan Fukui, Flann Hollow, Lane Thomas, Nicol Wells, Ballard Case, Hali Okuma, Eugenie Russell, Karin Alexandrov, The Guardian, Jardan, Taelor, Aedan, Saria, Zaera,  Mael, Keana, Tarai, Anix, Nayel, Naethan, Jaeco, Briya
description:
Velians sends a distress signal.
Odysseus picks up Velian survivors from Velian.
gm_note_npc: 2 Velian NPCs die during the Velian resque event
gm_notes: Velians will send a distress signal and this also activates the beacon on the map and then opens text comms and later on voice comms to Odysseus

name: ESS Harbinger - Mutiny
character_groups: Bridge Crew, Criminals, Engineers, Politics, Security, Armory
character_ids: Amir Bolton, Mark Bolton, Jill Montoya, Gira Hayakawa, Isha Hayakawa, Lane Hayakawa, Lane Thomas, Shae Thomas, Hedly Walker
description: ESS Harbinger is the first ship where the marshal law is overrun by a mutiny. All the commanders and some of the military personel are cast out from the ESS Harbinger to a small vessel which is uncapable to jump. Now the fleet needs to decide who would take them in before the next jump or will they be left behind. Here is a chance that Odysseus will take them in since there will be on board some of the people known in the Odysseus like the captain of the ESS Harbinger Mark Bolton is the father of Amir Bolton Chief Engineer.
gm_notes:
Criminals should get a shipment with the resqued.
Mutinees has give the people they are throwing out time to send letters to their loved ones
The ones on the vessel: Mark Bolton, Gira Hayakawa
